headline: PulteGroup (NYSE:PHM) Declares Quarterly Dividend Of US$0.22 Per Share
summary: PulteGroup (NYSE:PHM) recently affirmed its quarterly dividend, declaring a payout of $0.22 per common share. Amid a week of market activity where the major indices recorded an upswing, PulteGroup's shares saw an upward movement of 1.5%. This price change aligns with a broader market rally, marked by significant gains in technology stocks driven by strong earnings from companies like Microsoft and Meta. While the dividend declaration highlights PulteGroup's commitment to shareholder value,...

headline: PulteGroup Announces Quarterly Cash Dividend of $0.22 Per Share
summary: ATLANTA, May 01, 2025--PulteGroup, Inc. (NYSE: PHM) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.22 per common share payable July 2, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on June 17, 2025.

headline: PulteGroup, Inc. (PHM): Among The Lowest PE Ratio Stocks in S&P 500
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Lowest PE Ratio Stocks in S&P 500. In this article, we are going to take a look at where PulteGroup, Inc. (NYSE:PHM) stands against other most undervalued stocks. Big tech stocks just suffered a massive hit, with the Magnificent Seven shedding a combined $1.8 trillion in market value […]
